origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinanceNews.get_latest_news', 'description': 'Get the latest news articles on a specific financial topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial topic to search for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'count', 'type': 'INTEGER', 'description': 'The number of articles to return.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'news', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing recent news articles about the topic.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceStats.get_growth_rate', 'description': 'Get the growth rate of a specific financial sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial sector to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'year', 'type': 'INTEGER', 'description': 'The year for which to retrieve the growth rate.'}, {'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'INTEGER', 'description': 'The quarter for which to retrieve the growth rate.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'growth_rate', 'description': 'The growth rate of the sector for the specified period.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceStats.get_market_share', 'description': 'Get the market share of companies in a specific financial sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial sector to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_share', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing the market share of companies in the sector.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceCompany.get_company_details', 'description': 'Get detailed information about a specific financial company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the financial company.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'details', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the company.'}]}, {'name': 'MarketAnalysis.get_analysis_report', 'description': 'Get market analysis reports for a specific financial sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial sector to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing market analysis reports for the sector.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解中国消费金融市场的最新动态。首先，从最新的金融新闻中获取5篇关于消费金融市场的报道。然后，获取2024年第一季度中国消费金融公司的贷款增长率数据。接着，获取中国消费金融公司的市场份额排名。最后，通过公司名称获取某消费金融公司的详细信息，并获取一些市场分析报告。当前这一步的目标是什么?
从最新的金融新闻中获取5篇关于消费金融市场的报道。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'topic'的值是什么?
